title: The shepherd and the king and of Gillian the shepherds wife, with her churlish answer. Being full of mirth and patime. To the tune of Flying fame.
publisher: Printed by and for A.M. and sold by the booksellers of London,
notes: Verse - "In elder time there as [sic] of yore".
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Printed in five columns, in black letter, with woodcuts at head of first three columns.
Reproduction of the original in the Glasgow University Library.
